rnalysis.general.is_reference_table_defined¶

rnalysis.general.is_reference_table_defined(settings_start_phrase='big_table_path=')¶

Check whether a reference table path is defined.

Parameters

settings_start_phrase – The key phrase to look for in settings.ini (‘big_table_path=’).

Returns

True if defined, False if not defined.
